trans-unit.source: Exposes a <xref:System.IO.Stream> around a named pipe, which supports both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.
trans-unit.target: 公開<xref:System.IO.Stream>周圍具名管道，支援同步和非同步讀取和寫入作業。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Named pipes provide one-way or duplex pipes for communication between a pipe server and one or more pipe clients.
trans-unit.target: 具名的管道的管道伺服器和一或多個管道用戶端之間的通訊，提供單向或雙工的管道。

trans-unit.source: Named pipes can be used for interprocess communication locally or over a network.
trans-unit.target: 具名的管道可以用於處理序間通訊，在本機或網路。

trans-unit.source: A single pipe name can be shared by multiple NamedPipeClientStream objects.
trans-unit.target: 可由多個 NamedPipeClientStream 物件共用單一的管道名稱。

trans-unit.source: Any process can act as either a named pipe server or client, or both.
trans-unit.target: 任何處理程序可做為具名的管道伺服器或用戶端，或兩者。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For [!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/add/includes/winxppro-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/add/includes/win2kserver-md.md)], a maximum of 10 pipes can simultaneously connect over the network.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 的[!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/add/includes/winxppro-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/add/includes/win2kserver-md.md)]，最多 10 個管道同時可以透過網路連線。

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"></xref>類別具有指定的管道名稱。

trans-unit.target: -預設<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions>值為<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions>

trans-unit.target: -預設<xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>值為<xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>.</xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> </xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"></xref> class with the specified pipe and server names, and the specified pipe options, security impersonation level, and inheritability mode.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"></xref>指定管道的名稱、 伺服器名稱，與指定的管道選項、 安全性模擬等級，以及可繼承性模式的類別。

trans-unit.source: The pipe direction for this constructor is determined by the `desiredAccessRights` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的管道方向由`desiredAccessRights`參數。

trans-unit.source: If the `desiredAccessRights` value is <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>, the pipe direction will be <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`desiredAccessRights`值是<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>，您將<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>管道方向。</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>

trans-unit.source: If the value of `desiredAccessRights` is <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>, the pipe direction will be <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`desiredAccessRights`，<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>管道方向會<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>

trans-unit.source: If the value of `desiredAccessRights` includes both <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights> and <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>, the pipe direction will be <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`desiredAccessRights`包含這兩個<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights><xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>，管道方向<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection></xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>和</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>

trans-unit.source: The name of the remote computer to connect to, or "." to specify the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 要連線的遠端電腦的名稱或 」。 「 若要指定本機電腦。

trans-unit.source: The name of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: 管道名稱。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the desired access rights of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指定所需的存取權限的管道。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines how to open or create the pipe.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，決定如何開啟或建立管道。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines the security impersonation level.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，決定安全性模擬等級。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines whether the underlying handle will be inheritable by child processes.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，決定是否將可由子處理序繼承基礎控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: pipeName or serverName is .
trans-unit.target: pipeNameor serverName is .

trans-unit.source: pipeName or serverName is a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: pipeName或serverName為零長度字串。

trans-unit.source: pipeName is set to "anonymous".
trans-unit.target: pipeName設定為 「 匿名 」。

trans-unit.target: -options不是有效值。

trans-unit.target: -impersonationLevel不是有效值。

trans-unit.target: -inheritability不是有效值。

trans-unit.source: Connects to a waiting server with an infinite time-out value.
trans-unit.target: 連接至等候中伺服器與無限的逾時值。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%28System.Int32%29> method with an infinite time-out value.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%28System.Int32%29>具有無限的逾時值的方法。</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%28System.Int32%29>

trans-unit.source: This method waits for a pipe instance to become available.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會等候可用的管線執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A> might return before <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> is called from the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> object, but <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> will not return until <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A> has returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>之前可能會傳回<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>從呼叫<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>物件，但<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>之前將不會傳回<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>已恢復。</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A></xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any data written to the pipe after a <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream> object has connected, but before the server has called <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>, will be available to the server following the call to <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 寫入管道之後的任何資料<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>物件已經連線，但之前<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>，將可接至<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>。</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>呼叫的伺服器</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>，伺服器已呼叫</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>

trans-unit.source: The client is already connected.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端已連線。

trans-unit.source: Connects to a waiting server within the specified time-out period.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的逾時期限內連接至等候中伺服器。

trans-unit.source: This method waits for a pipe instance to become available.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會等候可用的管線執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A> might return before <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> is called from the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>, but <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> will not return until <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A> has returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>之前可能會傳回<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>從呼叫<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>，但<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>之前將不會傳回<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>已恢復。</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A></xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: You set the `timeout` parameter to <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite> to specify an infinite time-out value.
trans-unit.target: 您設定`timeout`參數<xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>來指定無限的逾時值。</xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>

trans-unit.source: Any data written to the pipe after a <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream> object has connected, but before the server has called <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>, will be available to the server following the call to <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 寫入管道之後的任何資料<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>物件已經連線，但之前<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>，將可接至<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>。</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>呼叫的伺服器</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>，伺服器已呼叫</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait for the server to respond before the connection times out.
trans-unit.target: 等候伺服器回應的連線逾時之前的毫秒數。

trans-unit.source: Could not connect to the server within the specified timeout period.
trans-unit.target: 無法連接到位於指定的伺服器 timeout 期間。

trans-unit.source: timeout is less than 0 and not set to .
trans-unit.target: timeout小於 0，且未設定為。

trans-unit.source: The client is already connected.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端已連線。

trans-unit.source: The server is connected to another client and the time-out period has expired.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器已連線到另一個用戶端和逾時期限過期。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously connects to a waiting server with an infinite timeout period.
trans-unit.target: 非同步連接至等候中伺服器無限的逾時期間。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous connect operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步工作連線作業。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously connects to a waiting server within the specified timeout period.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式在指定的逾時期限內連接至等候中伺服器。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait for the server to respond before the connection times out.
trans-unit.target: 等候伺服器回應的連線逾時之前的毫秒數。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous connect operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步工作連線作業。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously connects to a waiting server and monitors cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 非同步連接至等候中伺服器，並且監視取消要求。

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 要用於監控取消要求的語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None*>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None*>.</xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None*>

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous connect operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步工作連線作業。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously connects to a waiting server within the specified timeout period and monitors cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式在指定的逾時期限內連接至等候中伺服器，以及監視取消要求。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait for the server to respond before the connection times out.
trans-unit.target: 等候伺服器回應的連線逾時之前的毫秒數。

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 要用於監控取消要求的語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None*>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None*>.</xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None*>

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous connect operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步工作連線作業。

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"></xref> instance is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 釋出 unmanaged 的資源並執行其他清除作業之前<xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"></xref>執行個體回收進行回收。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of server instances that share the same pipe name.
trans-unit.target: 取得共用相同管道名稱的伺服器執行個體數目。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the number of server instances for the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> object that the current <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream> object has a handle to or is connected to.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回的伺服器執行個體數目<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>物件目前<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>物件的控制代碼，或者連接到。</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream> object has not yet connected to a named pipe server, or if the current pipe handle has not yet been set, this property throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>物件尚未連接到具名的管道伺服器，或如果尚未設定目前管道控制代碼，這個屬性會擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>

trans-unit.source: The number of server instances that share the same pipe name.
trans-unit.target: 共用相同管道名稱的伺服器執行個體數目。

trans-unit.source: The pipe handle has not been set.
trans-unit.target: 尚未設定管道控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: -or- The current <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"></xref> object has not yet connected to a <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: -目前<xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream"></xref>物件具有尚未連線至<xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The pipe is broken or an I/O error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 管道已中斷或發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The underlying pipe handle is closed.
trans-unit.target: 基礎管道控制代碼已關閉。
